channel.title: Very Important Question! On Death
channel.description: I have a question for anyone who can help me figure this out, i am currently trying to find out how i can do this:/ How do, when you get killed/die, the screen stay black, or you have a immunity to all, for 5 seconds. so like Call of duty, how can you make yourself not an npc or object take time to respawn?

item.title: Very Important Question! On Death
item.dc:creator: @Fr33dom99 Fr33dom99
item.description:
@Fr33dom99 wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:8, topic:546246”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665143.msg4446469#msg4446469 date=1409076252]

Can you rephrase what you’re trying to accomplish? I’m having a hard time understanding it.

He wants to add a 5 second timer or so where the player is invulnerable/invincible after they die.
[/quote]

Ah Okay.

Fr33dom99 - What revision do you have? The easiest way to do it is when the player dies and respawns, set their HP to 999999, then after setting it set a timer that after five seconds, set it back to normal hp and set updateRequired to true. If you tell me what revision I can give you some snippets.[/quote]

Its 667, my skype is xxprodegyxx if you dont mind, i just have been trying to figure it out…

Read full topic

item.title: Very Important Question! On Death
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:546246”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=665143.msg4446467#msg4446467 date=1409076119]
Can you rephrase what you’re trying to accomplish? I’m having a hard time understanding it.
[/quote]
He wants to add a 5 second timer or so where the player is invulnerable/invincible after they die.[/quote]

Ah Okay.

Fr33dom99 - What revision do you have? The easiest way to do it is when the player dies and respawns, set their HP to 999999, then after setting it set a timer that after five seconds, set it back to normal hp and set updateRequired to true. If you tell me what revision I can give you some snippets.

Read full topic
